verses.text: The \w Revelation|strong="G0602"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, to \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w unto|strong="G1401"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w* come to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G4591"\w* sent \w and|strong="G0649"\w* \w signified|strong="G4591"\w* \add it\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w unto|strong="G1401"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* bare \w record|strong="G3140"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of all things \w that|strong="G3745"\w* he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add is\add* he that \w readeth|strong="G0314"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of this \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* those things which are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \add is\add* at \w hand|strong="G1451"\w*.

\w John|strong="G2491"\w* to \w the|strong="G1577"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* which are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* him which \w is|strong="G5607"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which is to \w come|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w Spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add who is\add* \w the|strong="G3144"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w*, \add and\add* the first \w begotten|strong="G4416"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w prince|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*. Unto him that \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w washed|strong="G3068"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*; to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2904"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, he \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w clouds|strong="G3507"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w eye|strong="G3788"\w* shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3748"\w* \add also\add* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w pierced|strong="G1574"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w kindreds|strong="G5443"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* shall \w wail|strong="G2875"\w* because \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. Even \w so|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Alpha|strong="G0001"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Omega|strong="G5598"\+w*, \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the ending|strong="G5056"\+w*,\wj* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, which \w is|strong="G5607"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which is to \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, the \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, who \w also|strong="G2532"\w* am \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w companion|strong="G4791"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w isle|strong="G3520"\w* that is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Patmos|strong="G3963"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

I \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w Lordâ€™s|strong="G2960"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w behind|strong="G3694"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* \w a|strong="G5456"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* of a \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Alpha|strong="G0001"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Omega|strong="G5598"\+w*, \+w the first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the last|strong="G2078"\+w*:\wj* \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou seest|strong="G0991"\+w*, \+w write|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a book|strong="G0975"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w send|strong="G3992"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w unto the|strong="G1577"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w churches|strong="G1577"\+w* \+w which are|strong="G0773"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Asia|strong="G0773"\+w*; \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Smyrna|strong="G4667"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Pergamos|strong="G4010"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Thyatira|strong="G2363"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Sardis|strong="G4554"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Philadelphia|strong="G5359"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Laodicea|strong="G2993"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* to \w see|strong="G0991"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w that|strong="G3748"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* being \w turned|strong="G1994"\w*, I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* golden \w candlesticks|strong="G3087"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w the|strong="G3087"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w candlesticks|strong="G3087"\w* \add one\add* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* unto the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G1746"\w* with a garment down to the \w foot|strong="G4158"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w girt|strong="G4024"\w* \w about|strong="G4314"\w* the \w paps|strong="G3149"\w* with \w a|strong="G2223"\w* \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w girdle|strong="G2223"\w*.

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add his\add* \w hairs|strong="G2359"\w* \add were\add* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* \w wool|strong="G2053"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* as \w snow|strong="G5510"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \add were\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w flame|strong="G5395"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* unto fine \w brass|strong="G5474"\w*, as \w if|strong="G5613"\w* they \w burned|strong="G4448"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w furnace|strong="G2575"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G5204"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w stars|strong="G0792"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G4750"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w went|strong="G1607"\w* \w a|strong="G4501"\w* \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w twoedged|strong="G1366"\w* \w sword|strong="G4501"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w countenance|strong="G3799"\w* \add was\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w shineth|strong="G5316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w strength|strong="G1411"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \wj  \+w Fear|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the last|strong="G2078"\+w*:\wj*

\wj I \+add am\+add* \+w he that liveth|strong="G2198"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w was|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w dead|strong="G3498"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w alive|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w evermore|strong="G0165"\+w*, \+w Amen|strong="G0281"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the keys|strong="G2807"\+w* \+w of hell|strong="G0086"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of death|strong="G2288"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Write|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w the things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou hast seen|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w hereafter|strong="G3326"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w The mystery|strong="G3466"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G0792"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w stars|strong="G0792"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou sawest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w right hand|strong="G1188"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3087"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w golden|strong="G5552"\+w* \+w candlesticks|strong="G3087"\+w*. \+w The seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w stars|strong="G0792"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w the angels|strong="G0032"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G1577"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w churches|strong="G1577"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3087"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w candlesticks|strong="G3087"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou sawest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1577"\+w* \+w seven|strong="G2033"\+w* \+w churches|strong="G1577"\+w*.\wj*
